text: e of physical creation on Earth 60 human beings were manifested, in adult form, out of the Cloistered Races morphogenetic field. Each of the five Cloistered Races began with a family of 12 humans, six male, six female. They entered Earth together, with equal standing, seeding the brown-Ur-Antrian, red-Breanoua, white-Hibiru, yel- low-Melchizedek and black-Yunaseti races. Earth populations built up through this lineage. After about 10 million years of evolution (25-15 million YA) the Third Root Race was entered through peoples of the Ur-Antrian Cloister. The Third 17
